alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 3:27PM MST until December 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches across lower elevations, with 5 to 8 inches over Marias Pass and locally higher in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph at times through around midnight. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region Zone. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Blowing snow may reduce visibility at times through around midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
